jp_clean: やったぜ、このカニったれ！！！
やったぜ、このカニったれ！！！

jp_raw: \m[vb]やったぜ、このカニったれーーーー！！！
jp_clean: やったぜ、このカニったれーーーー！！！

en_raw: How could you say all those horrible things to us, Siffrin!
en_clean: How could you say all those horrible things to us, Siffrin!
jp_raw: \m[vm]どうしてわたしたちに、あんなひどいことを言ったの、シフラン！
jp_clean: どうしてわたしたちに、あんなひどいことを言ったの、シフラン！

en_raw: That wasn't cool. Not cool at all!!!
en_clean: That wasn't cool. Not cool at all!!!

en_raw: You were kind of a crab earlier, yeah.
en_clean: You were kind of a crab earlier, yeah.
jp_raw: \m[vi]あれはカニもどきみたいにひどかった。
jp_clean: あれはカニもどきみたいにひどかった。

en_raw: But why did you go off on your own?
en_clean: But why did you go off on your own?
jp_raw: \m[vo]だが、どうして一人で行ったんだ？
jp_clean: だが、どうして一人で行ったんだ？

en_raw: Going through the entire House alone... That was foolish, Siffrin.
en_clean: Going through the entire House alone... That was foolish, Siffrin.
jp_raw: 館を一人きりで進むなんて...\!\ 愚か者のすることだ、シフラン。
jp_clean: 館を一人きりで進むなんて... 愚か者のすることだ、シフラン。

en_raw: And why were you acting so weird?
en_clean: And why were you acting so weird?
jp_raw: \m[vi]それに、様子が変だ。\!どうしたんだ？
jp_clean: それに、様子が変だ。どうしたんだ？

en_raw: It's not like you to be mean like this...
en_clean: It's not like you to be mean like this...
jp_raw: あんな風にひどい態度をとるなんて、きみらしくない。
jp_clean: あんな風にひどい態度をとるなんて、きみらしくない。

en_raw: You didn't mean it, right? You were mad about something?
en_clean: You didn't mean it, right? You were mad about something?
jp_raw: \m[vb]本気じゃなかったんだろ？\!\ 何かムカつくことでもあった？
jp_clean: 本気じゃなかったんだろ？ 何かムカつくことでもあった？

en_raw: Something happened before you talked to us, it had to or you wouldn't-- Wouldn't have said all that, right?
en_clean: Something happened before you talked to us, it had to or you wouldn't-- Wouldn't have said all that, right?
jp_raw: オイラたちと話す前に、何かあったんだ。\!絶対そうだよ。\!じゃなきゃ――\!\ フランがあんなこと言うはずないだろ？
jp_clean: オイラたちと話す前に、何かあったんだ。絶対そうだよ。じゃなきゃ―― フランがあんなこと言うはずないだろ？
シフラン？ 聞こえるか？

en_raw: What's wrong, do you feel sick?!
en_clean: What's wrong, do you feel sick?!
jp_clean: どうしたんだよ。気分悪い！？

en_raw: Siffrin, let me help you up...   Huh?
en_clean: Siffrin, let me help you up...   Huh?

en_raw: Siffrin, your skin feels so warm... What's wrong?
en_clean: Siffrin, your skin feels so warm... What's wrong?
jp_raw: \m[vm]シフラン、すごく熱いよ...\!\ どうしたの？
jp_clean: シフラン、すごく熱いよ... どうしたの？

jp_raw: \m[vo]...\!燃えるように熱いぞ。\!何事だ？
jp_clean: ...燃えるように熱いぞ。何事だ？

en_raw: Sif went up the entire House on their own, right? It'd make sense for them to be woozy...
en_clean: Sif went up the entire House on their own, right? It'd make sense for them to be woozy...
jp_raw: \m[vi]シフは一人で館じゅうを回ったんだよな？\!\ ふらつくのも当然だ...
jp_clean: シフは一人で館じゅうを回ったんだよな？ ふらつくのも当然だ...

en_raw: We had a lot of trouble, even with Loop's help... I can't imagine doing it alone.
en_clean: We had a lot of trouble, even with Loop's help... I can't imagine doing it alone.
jp_raw: \m[vm]わたしたちだって、ループの助けがあってもすごく大変だったのに...\!\ それを一人でやるなんて、想像もできないよ。
jp_clean: わたしたちだって、ループの助けがあってもすごく大変だったのに... それを一人でやるなんて、想像もできないよ。

en_raw: Oh, your friend, Loop? I think you two know each other, somehow...
en_clean: Oh, your friend, Loop? I think you two know each other, somehow...
jp_raw: \m[vo]ああ、ループはきみの友達だな？\!\ 二人は知り合いだと思ったんだ...
jp_clean: ああ、ループはきみの友達だな？ 二人は知り合いだと思ったんだ...

jp_raw: \m[vb]ループとはちょっと前に出会ったんだ！！！
jp_clean: ループとはちょっと前に出会ったんだ！！！

en_raw: We were looking for you so we could talk to you, but we couldn't find you anywhere, and no one knew where you went--
en_clean: We were looking for you so we could talk to you, but we couldn't find you anywhere, and no one knew where you went--
jp_raw: フランと話したかったから、探してたんだ。\!でも、どこにもいないし、\!誰もフランの行き先を知らなくて――
jp_clean: フランと話したかったから、探してたんだ。でも、どこにもいないし、誰もフランの行き先を知らなくて――

en_raw: And so we ended up at the Favor Tree, and Za asked it to help us find you, and then this weird star appeared.
en_clean: And so we ended up at the Favor Tree, and Za asked it to help us find you, and then this weird star appeared.
jp_raw: 最後に願いの木のところに行ったんだ。\!そこで、ザーがフランを見つけられますように、ってお願いした。\!そうしたら、変な星のやつが現れてさ。
jp_clean: 最後に願いの木のところに行ったんだ。そこで、ザーがフランを見つけられますように、ってお願いした。そうしたら、変な星のやつが現れてさ。

en_raw: They told us they were a star and that's why they were spiky and glowy!
en_clean: They told us they were a star and that's why they were spiky and glowy!
jp_raw: 星だから、とんがってて光ってるんだって言ってたぞ！
jp_clean: 星だから、とんがってて光ってるんだって言ってたぞ！

en_raw: They helped us find you. We couldn't have made it here without your help.
en_clean: They helped us find you. We couldn't have made it here without your help.

en_raw: They made us do a weird hand symbol so we could hear them as we went up.
en_clean: They made us do a weird hand symbol so we could hear them as we went up.
jp_raw: \m[vi]手で変な形を作るやり方も教えてもらった。\!だから、館の中でもループの声が聞こえたんだ。
jp_clean: 手で変な形を作るやり方も教えてもらった。だから、館の中でもループの声が聞こえたんだ。

en_raw: But we could hear them less and less as we went up... I can't hear them at all, now.
en_clean: But we could hear them less and less as we went up... I can't hear them at all, now.
jp_raw: \m[vm]だけど、階を上がるごとに声は遠くなって...\!\ 今はもう、聞こえなくなっちゃった。
jp_clean: だけど、階を上がるごとに声は遠くなって... 今はもう、聞こえなくなっちゃった。

en_raw: But for you to go through the entire House alone...
en_clean: But for you to go through the entire House alone...
jp_raw: \m[vo]だが、シフランは一人で館を回ったのだな...
jp_clean: だが、シフランは一人で館を回ったのだな...

en_raw: We barely saw any Sadnesses, but it was still a struggle.
en_clean: We barely saw any Sadnesses, but it was still a struggle.
jp_raw: 哀し身はほとんどいなかったが、それでも私たちは苦労した。
jp_clean: 哀し身はほとんどいなかったが、それでも私たちは苦労した。

en_raw: And the House felt very weird, when we were coming up...
en_clean: And the House felt very weird, when we were coming up...
jp_raw: \m[vm]それに、館は妙な感じだった。\!ここまで来る間じゅう...
jp_clean: それに、館は妙な感じだった。ここまで来る間じゅう...

en_raw: We saw weird stuff! Like you were walking around but not really, and rooms were repeating and leading us weird places!
en_clean: We saw weird stuff! Like you were walking around but not really, and rooms were repeating and leading us weird places!
jp_raw: \m[vb]ヘンなもんを見たんだ！\!\ フランが歩いてた。\!でも、本物のフランじゃなかった。\!それに、同じ部屋が続いてて、ヘンな場所に入ったり！
jp_clean: ヘンなもんを見たんだ！ フランが歩いてた。でも、本物のフランじゃなかった。それに、同じ部屋が続いてて、ヘンな場所に入ったり！

en_raw: It did all feel very... Off.
en_clean: It did all feel very... Off.

en_raw: Moreso than I was expecting, even with the King taking over...
en_clean: Moreso than I was expecting, even with the King taking over...
jp_raw: 思っていたよりも妙だし、王がこの館を奪ったにしても...
jp_clean: 思っていたよりも妙だし、王がこの館を奪ったにしても...

jp_raw: \m[vi]世界の終わりっぽい感じ、みたいな？
jp_clean: 世界の終わりっぽい感じ、みたいな？

en_raw: Please don't say things like that, please.
en_clean: Please don't say things like that, please.
jp_raw: そんな冗談やめてよ、お願い。
jp_clean: そんな冗談やめてよ、お願い。

en_raw: The House felt almost unsettling, too... I suppose it's better now, but then, why. . .
en_clean: The House felt almost unsettling, too... I suppose it's better now, but then, why. . .

en_raw: The Head Housemaiden should be up ahead, yes?
en_clean: The Head Housemaiden should be up ahead, yes?
jp_raw: 侍祭長はこの先にいるんだろう？
jp_clean: 侍祭長はこの先にいるんだろう？

en_raw: Y-Yes! We should get Siffrin to her... She might be able to help!
en_clean: Y-Yes! We should get Siffrin to her... She might be able to help!
jp_raw: \m[vm]う、うん！\!\ シフランを彼女のところに連れていかなきゃ...\!\ 侍祭長なら力になってくれるかも！
jp_clean: う、うん！ シフランを彼女のところに連れていかなきゃ... 侍祭長なら力になってくれるかも！

en_raw: And she might be able to tell us what's happening, too.
en_clean: And she might be able to tell us what's happening, too.

jp_clean: それに、何が起きているのかも教えてくれるかもな。

en_raw: I-I'll go on ahead and let her know!!!
en_clean: I-I'll go on ahead and let her know!!!

jp_clean: わ、わたしは先に行って、侍祭長に知らせてくる！！！

en_raw: Maybe...   Since he was so powerful, he was filled with Craft, which allowed him to change his size...
en_clean: Maybe...   Since he was so powerful, he was filled with Craft, which allowed him to change his size...

en_raw: And now that he's frozen, the Craft escaped, and now he's smaller.
en_clean: And now that he's frozen, the Craft escaped, and now he's smaller.

jp_clean: 時間を止められた今は、体内のクラフトが抜けて、体が小さくなったんだよ。

jp_clean: (彼が望んでいるのはこれだ)

en_clean: You won't be going any farther, young one.
jp_raw: \m[vo]それ以上遠くへは行かせないぞ、若者よ。

jp_clean: それ以上遠くへは行かせないぞ、若者よ。

en_raw: The Head Housemaiden is just ahead...
en_clean: The Head Housemaiden is just ahead...

en_raw: I'm sure she'll be able to heal you, Siffrin! So just-- Just come!
en_clean: I'm sure she'll be able to heal you, Siffrin! So just-- Just come!
jp_raw: 彼女ならきっとあなたを回復してくれるよ、シフラン！\!\ ほら――こっち！
jp_clean: 彼女ならきっとあなたを回復してくれるよ、シフラン！ ほら――こっち！

jp_clean: (イザボーが僕を受け止める)

en_clean: The House feels off here too... I thought it would've gone back to normal after we beat the King...

jp_clean: ここもやっぱり変な感じだね... 王を倒したら、元通りになるかと思ったのに...

jp_clean: それに、圧迫感も消えていない...

en_clean: And it smells weird now still!!!

jp_raw: \m[vi]ってことは...\!\ ちょっと心配だな？
jp_clean: ってことは... ちょっと心配だな？

en_raw: ...I'm worried... I hope everyone is okay...
en_clean: ...I'm worried... I hope everyone is okay...
jp_raw: \m[vm]...\!不安だな...\!\ みんな無事だといいけど...
jp_clean: ...不安だな... みんな無事だといいけど...

en_raw: It's not dark, or light, or anything... It's just...
en_clean: It's not dark, or light, or anything... It's just...

jp_clean: 暗くもないし、明るくもない、なんとも言えない... あれは...

en_clean: We need to get to the Head Housemaiden as fast as possible.

jp_clean: 侍祭長のところへ急がなければ。

en_clean: He still feels super warm, Odile.
jp_raw: \m[vi]触るとまだ熱いぞ、オディール。
jp_clean: 触るとまだ熱いぞ、オディール。

jp_clean: うわっ！ 震えてるぞ、シフ...

en_raw: Do you get vertigo like Dile, Frin?
en_clean: Do you get vertigo like Dile, Frin?

jp_clean: ディールみたいにめまいがするのか、フラン？

en_clean: You look exhausted... I'm sorry, just a little bit to go.

en_raw: Hm... If Frin's afraid of heights too...
en_clean: Hm... If Frin's afraid of heights too...

jp_clean: うーん... 高い所が怖いんだったら...

jp_clean: 手を握ってやろうか、フラン？

en_clean: Okay, don't look down! Look at me!

jp_clean: 下を見んなよ！ オイラを見て！

en_raw: I-It's only a bit longer, Siffrin...
en_clean: I-It's only a bit longer, Siffrin...

en_clean: The Head Housemaiden is right ahead!
jp_raw: 侍祭長はすぐ先だからね！
jp_clean: 侍祭長はすぐ先だからね！

en_raw: Th-There'll be time for that later, Siffrin!
en_clean: Th-There'll be time for that later, Siffrin!
jp_raw: そ、その話は後でもできるでしょ、シフラン！
jp_clean: そ、その話は後でもできるでしょ、シフラン！

jp_raw: ミラベル、ああ、愛しい子...
jp_clean: ああ、親愛なるミラベル...
ミラベル、ああ、愛しい子...

en_raw: I'm so proud of you! Look at you! The savior of Vau--
en_clean: I'm so proud of you! Look at you! The savior of Vau--

jp_clean: 誇りに思いますわ！ ごらんなさい！ 救国の英――

jp_clean: そんな時間はないのです、ユーフラジー！

jp_raw: 仲間の――\!\ シフランが――
jp_clean: 仲間の―― シフランが――

en_clean: We have someone we need you to take a look at.
jp_raw: \m[vo]あなたに診てもらいたい者がいるんだ。
jp_clean: あなたに診てもらいたい者がいるんだ。

en_clean: And also the world outside looks like it's ending so if you could help with that too that'd be great.

jp_clean: それに、部屋の外は世界の終わりみたいになってきてる。力を貸してくれ。

jp_raw: \m[vh]ああ、なんと、ええ、分かりました！
jp_clean: ああ、なんと、ええ、分かりました！

en_raw: Well, he sure is running a fever!
en_clean: Well, he sure is running a fever!
jp_raw: まあ、彼は熱を出していますね！
jp_clean: まあ、彼は熱を出していますね！

en_raw: Those symptoms... I would say they've been using Crafts too much, maybe?
en_clean: Those symptoms... I would say they've been using Crafts too much, maybe?
jp_raw: この症状...\!\ クラフトを使いすぎたのではありませんか？
jp_clean: この症状... クラフトを使いすぎたのではありませんか？

en_raw: I think so! Maybe they've used too many Crafts at a time without taking time to rest, or without cooling down for as long as they needed!
en_clean: I think so! Maybe they've used too many Crafts at a time without taking time to rest, or without cooling down for as long as they needed!

jp_raw: \m[clear](クールダウンの時間なんかない)
jp_clean: (クールダウンの時間なんかない)

en_raw: Does that sort of thing usually give someone a fever, though? I've never heard that before...
en_clean: Does that sort of thing usually give someone a fever, though? I've never heard that before...
jp_raw: \m[vm]だけど、それで熱が出るの？\!\ 聞いたことないけど...
jp_clean: だけど、それで熱が出るの？ 聞いたことないけど...

en_raw: I've heard about it before... It doesn't happen often, that's for sure!
en_clean: I've heard about it before... It doesn't happen often, that's for sure!
jp_raw: \m[vi]俺は聞いたことがあるぜ...\!\ めったにないことだけどな！
jp_clean: 俺は聞いたことがあるぜ... めったにないことだけどな！

en_clean: You would need to Craft, like... an IMMENSE amount, for long periods of time.

en_raw: Like Crafting a painting for weeks at a time?
en_clean: Like Crafting a painting for weeks at a time?

jp_clean: 1枚の絵を何週間もクラフトし続けるとか？

en_clean: Or going through an entire House, fighting against Sadnesses and a King for hours?

jp_clean: 館の中を歩き回って、何時間も哀し身や王と戦い続けるとか？

jp_clean: ええ、ホントのホントに大丈夫ですわ！

en_raw: And do you super duper promise?
en_clean: And do you super duper promise?

jp_clean: ホントのホントに絶対大丈夫？

jp_clean: ええ、ホントのホントに絶対大丈夫ですわ！

jp_raw: 体を休めればよいだけです。
jp_clean: 体を休めればよいだけです。

en_raw: Okay... Well, that's something at least.
en_clean: Okay... Well, that's something at least.
jp_raw: \m[vo]そうか...\!\ まあ、それならいいだろう。
jp_clean: そうか... まあ、それならいいだろう。

en_clean: And what about the world outside?
jp_raw: 外の世界のことはどうする？
jp_clean: 外の世界のことはどうする？

en_raw: I...   I don't know, but... I can feel everything around us so strongly, and it feels... Wrong.
en_clean: I...   I don't know, but... I can feel everything around us so strongly, and it feels... Wrong.

en_raw: Every time I've tried to reach out and feel what's happening, I sense... Chaos...
en_clean: Every time I've tried to reach out and feel what's happening, I sense... Chaos...
